tasks.subject: Study how TypeScript CLI apps are created and tested.
Initialize the project.
tasks.definition: Initialize the project with TypeScript, Rollup, ESLint and Prettier.

tasks.subject: Create a test to test that the app prints it's name with the current version when it is run from the command line.
tasks.definition: Add and configure jest, create the test using node:child_process.execSync(), and edit pclock.ts so that the test is passed.
